681C0A8BFD20489A85BFDCA774AF8E84.description: Envision oneself or another individual employed in the field of machining in the future and describe the corresponding career journey including: a description of the position (e.g., location, occupation, employer, working conditions, duties/responsibilities, salary and benefits); skills, characteristics, attitudes, traits and interests that led to the career choice; education and training; mentorship opportunities accessed and offered to others; leadership opportunities; and, a summary of the supports provided by networks of individuals and organizations.
